topic.title: View Yeastar Click to Call Details
topic.shortdesc: View Yeastar Click to Call details or configure Chrome-specific settings.

body.p: Follow one of the methods below to configure Chrome-specific settings, or view details about Yeastar Click to Call, such as version, size, permissions and so on.

Open Google Chrome Browser, and choose one of the following methods:
In the search bar, enter chrome://extensions/, and click Details.
On the right of search bar (URL field), go to
Manage extensions .
